title: Crossbows (skill)
data:
{{obsolete}}
''This page refers to the obsolete skill. For the new skill, see [[Ranged Weapons]]. For the obsolete item, see [[crossbow (item)]].''

The '''Crossbows''' skills governs a character's mastery of [[hand crossbow]]s, [[arbalest]]s and [[triple crossbow]]s. Crossbows fire [[bolt]]s and are slower than [[bows]], but tend to be more accurate and hit harder early on.
